dmca.title: [ABUSE] Coppyright Content - Beach-Beauties.com
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, August 31, 2004 8:53 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Coppyright Content - Beach-Beauties.com]

For your review.
-- 
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

-------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Coppyright Content - Beach-Beauties.com
Date: Sat, 28 Aug 2004 12:55:30 -0400
From: Webmaster <webmaster@identitywebsolutions.com>
To: abuse@servermatrix.com

Hello,

I am sending this e-mail as a courtsey to inform you that the site 
Beach-Beatuies.com is displaying pictures of a model we represent, 
Courtney Felaech. She is named as 'chealse' on this website. If the site 
is not suspeded right away, we will go after you, the hosting company, 
for each day that the website remains up. Please review current 
copyright law, and notice that you can be charge a minimum of $750, and 
a maximum of $3000, for each instance of copyright infringment. We have 
notied how many pictures are displayed on the site, and will beging 
documenting them for our legal case starting with the buisness week on 
monday. I hope we do not have to visit you in a civil, and criminal 
court of law, but many hosting companies are not cooperative.

Thank you,
Ron S.
IWS - Legal Dpt.
